maya/beastmayaplugin/src/liveasyncjob.cpp

#include "beastutils.h"
#include "jobcontext.h"
#include "liveasyncjob.h"
#include "plugincontext.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.h"
#include "mayacallbacks/livesettings.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeenums.h"

#include <maya/MGlobal.h>

namespace beastmaya {

LiveAsyncJob::LiveAsyncJob(JobContextPtr& bjc, BeastCameraPtr& renderCam, bool cameraRender) : 
AsyncTask(L"liveErnstJob"),
m_bjc(bjc)
{
        BeastManager& manager = bjc->getPluginContext().getManager();
        BeastScene& scene = bjc->getSceneManager().getScene();

        m_job = manager.createErnstLiveJob(L"ernstJob", scene);

        m_settingsNode = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");

        int2 liveViewResolution = {640, 480}; 
        getCompoundPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"liveViewRes", liveViewResolution);

        // Create the camera target
        BeastTargetPtr cameraTarget = m_job->createCameraTarget(L"renderCamTarget", *renderCam, liveViewResolution[0], liveViewResolution[1], cameraRender);
        m_liveSettings.reset(new LiveSettings(m_settingsNode, m_job, cameraTarget, renderCam));
}

LiveAsyncJob::~LiveAsyncJob() {
}

void LiveAsyncJob::threadMain() {
        try {
                m_liveSettings->updateCameraSettings();

                bool enableDistribution = true;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"distribution", enableDistribution);
                m_job->start(ILB_SR_NO_DISPLAY, enableDistribution ? ILB_RD_AUTODETECT : ILB_RD_FORCE_LOCAL);
                m_job->setErnstDisplayGamma(2.2f);

                float directScale = 1.0f;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"directScale", directScale);
                m_job->setErnstDirectIllumination(directScale);

                float indirectScale = 1.0f;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"indirectScale", indirectScale);
                m_job->setErnstIndirectIllumination(indirectScale);

                float diffuseBoost = 1.0f;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"diffuseBoost", diffuseBoost);
                m_job->setErnstDiffuseBoost(diffuseBoost);

                float emissiveScale = 1.0f;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"emissiveScale", emissiveScale);
                m_job->setErnstEmissiveScale(emissiveScale);

                int maxRayDepth = 1;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"maxRayDepth", maxRayDepth);
                m_job->setRenderMaxDepth(maxRayDepth);

                int liveNoiseReductionType = 0;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"liveNoiseReduction", liveNoiseReductionType);
                const float varianceTreshold = getErnstVarianceThreshold((ELiveNoiseReduction)liveNoiseReductionType);
                m_job->setErnstVarianceThreshold(varianceTreshold);

                int causticsMode = 0;
                getPlugValue(m_settingsNode, L"causticsMode", causticsMode);
                m_job->setCausticsMode((ECausticsModeType)causticsMode);

                while(!m_terminationRequested) {
                        m_job->waitDone(500);

                        if (!m_job->isRunning()) {
                                // Job closed for some reason. Check why and leave.
                                checkJobStatus(m_job->getResult());
                                break;
                        }

                        while(m_job->hasUpdate() && !m_terminationRequested) {
                                onUpdate(m_job->updateType());
                                m_job->destroyUpdate();
                        }
                }
        } catch (BeastException& e) {
                MGlobal::displayError(e.getTypeString().c_str());
                MGlobal::displayError(e.getExtendErrorInformation().c_str());
        }
}

LiveAsyncJobPtr LiveAsyncJob::getInstance() {
        return std::static_pointer_cast<LiveAsyncJob>(AsyncHandler::getInstance()->getAsyncTask(L"liveErnstJob"));
}
}
